name: Landing
longDes: You are at the top of the grand staircase, at a landing on the second floor. A grand piano stands in front of a large picture window to the South. Through the window you can see the expansive front lawns beyond. To the Northeast is a door to the green room. To the Southeast is a bathroom. There is a door to the Southwest, through which you can see linens. A door to the Northwest leads to the red room.
shortDes: You are on the second floor landing of the house. A grand piano occupies much of the flooor space here. A window faces south, overlooking the lawns. There is a staircase spiraling down to the foyer below. A door to the Northeast leads to the greenroom. A door to the Southeast leads to a bath. There is also a door to the Southwest heading to a linen closet, and a door to the Northwest going to the red room

features.name: piano
features.preActionDes: This is an old grand piano. Good thing your mother made you take lessons when you were a kid!
features.inActionDes: The piano begins playing a classical tune. You recognize it, but one of the notes is out of tune.
features.postActionDes: This piano played a tune after you painted. One of the notes was off-key.

features.name: piano keys
features.preActionDes: You look at the keys. It's been a while since you've 'tickled the ivories', but you feel like you could give it a shot.
features.inActionDes: While playing the piano, you discover that the same note is off-key as you heard before.
features.postActionDes: You played the piano. One of the notes is off-key.

features.name: “piano lid
features.inActionDes: You open the piano lid and discover a key attached to one of the hammers.
features.postActionDes: You grabbed the key out of this piano.

features.name: “south window
features.preActionDes: You can see the front porch from here.
